title: (x) Help with Font ID / 'Cafe Kahuna' - Ravie, Pristina {Mike Y, Mike F}
content:
Hi,

I have been trying to identify this font but have not had much success. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

[http://typophile.com/files/cafe\_font\_0.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704053549/http:/typophile.com/files/cafe_font_0.jpg "http://typophile.com/files/cafe\_font\_0.jpg")

Thank you

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cafe\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704053549/http:/typophile.com/files/cafe_font_0.jpg) | 30.99 KB |
author: ckd

comments.content:
KAHUNA is Font Bureau's [Ravie](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704053549/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/ravie/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D72%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DKAHUNA%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D24). Still looking for Cafe, but stop me if you don't want that one.

- Mike Yanega

Hi. Thank you for your help! Yes, if you are able to identify the font Cafe as well, that would be great.

Conrad

I thought I would be able to find Cafe, but have not been able to find it. It may be hand-drawn(hard to prove without any duplicate letters). John Benson's [Caliban](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704053549/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caliban/) might be an alternative you could use.

- Mike Yanega

I'm sorry I didn't pay attention to this earlier. I think that 'Cafe' is [Pristina](http://web.archive.org/web/20100704053549/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pristina/) stretched, manually heavied up and further abused.
Yes, I think you’ve nailed it. Double Mike Tag Team strikes again.

Good one Mike. I probably looked at it several times during my searches and didn't see the connection.

- Mike Yanega

Terrific, thank you all for your help and input!

Conrad
